enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
sentences: During this session (14-17 October 2013, Batumi, Georgia) the Panel considered and adopted two methodology reports: '2013 Supplement to the 2006 IPCC Guidelines for National GHG Inventories: Wetlands' and '2013 Revised Supplementary Methods and Good Practice Guidance Arising from the Kyoto Protocol'.
The IPCC also undertook initial discussions on mapping the IPCC's future.
